website_summaries.verdict: A professional-quality model with the latest technology for salon-quality results.
pros: Smart technology adapts to hair's specific needs for outstanding results
Glides through hair thanks to the straightening plates' glossy finish
cons: A few irons' plates didn't line up properly

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I was exceptionally lucky to get these during a Black Friday sale. I’ve had every model of GHD over the years and these are by far the best. Some people really don’t need straighteners and complain about frizz and I just giggle as they have no idea of the daily struggle for those of us with super thick curly frizzy hair. Now these GHDs glide through my hair like a hot knife through butter, they’re amazing and my hair is now sleek and straight and swishes!
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really pleased with this hair straightener. My hair was getting very thin and dry, after setting my old straightener high (the only way my hair would stay straight for any length of time) for too long. I wondered if my ghd Platinum, with its fixed temperature of 180 degrees would leave my hair straight all day. It does and the condition of my hair's really starting to recover now. One of the best features for me is the totally cool wall. I had tried a couple which actually burnt the skin on my neck and brow as I used them. I'd recommend this product on many levels
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa

customer_reviews.title: These are the best hair straighteners i've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my old remington's that lasted 10 years so i needed something that would be worth the investment and live up to the love i had for my good 'ol remmy's. People always recommend GHD's so i thought why not give it a try. I can safely say that if you need new straighteners look no further. These heat up super quickly, leave your hair soft and shiny and straight within minutes! They are well worth the price. Although they do not come with a heat mat just a heat sleeve that can be difficult to get off especially when hot so that should be considered. They look great too!
customer_reviews.author: Spikycactus24

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: I was a little sceptical about buying these as I’ve always used GHDs but wasn’t sure what the difference would be in these (other than paying more) however so far I am pleased to say that I do feel that they make my hair shinier and the style lasts for longer. Whilst I have always been incredibly happy with my GHDs if you fancy an upgrade these do feel like it. Very sleek and easy to use and my hair feels healthier. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Bestest ever ever
customer_reviews.text: By far the best straighteners I’ve used. I have thick wavy hair and these have it straight in no time. Plus I’ve found I’m not having to straighten as often. They heat up really quickly . My hair looks in really good condition since I swapped over to these. Not sure if it’s just down to the straightners or a combination of these and now using a keystone based shampoo n conditioner and massage coconut oil into the ends of my hair every night. Any hoo hairs looks fab and straighteners are fab too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sub-standard ghd product.
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed with this. Really difficult to use compared to my old ghd, it just doesn’t grip the hair, it’s like it doesn’t close tightly enough and have to use my other hand to try & clasp it tighter?? Takes twice as long to straighten hair & the end result is nowhere near as good. Do NOT recommend. 👎🏼
customer_reviews.author: Caroline O'Toole

customer_reviews.title: Silky smooth hair.
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing wrong with my old GHD’s but someone mentioned having these and said how easily they straightened your hair. So I thought I’d try them. They heated up extremely quickly and initially they seemed to smooth to straighten and I thought I’d made a mistake. How wrong I was! They are very smooth and it really doesn’t feel like they’re powerful enough to straighten but as soon as you look at what you’ve done you can see how perfectly straight it’s made your hair. It leaves it silky smooth too and just glides through. I’m so pleased I listened to my friend’s recommendation as I’m so impressed with them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Acland

customer_reviews.title: Heat up fast. Look good
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of these. They heat up very quick (seconds) and if you haven’t used in a while or forget to them off they switch off automatically. They seem to glide through my hair though and sometimes slip. I do have long hair so might not have the problem of hair shorter. But, I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is the first GHD straightener I've ever owned and although they are expensive, they are 100% worth the price for 70% less damage to hair. My hair is bleached which is why I hardly ever use my standard ceramic coated straighteners, so when I saw these for 160 quid I had to have them. My hair feels healthy and looks amazing after using these. They heat up super quick and 1 pass straightens my hair so I don't need to continually go over the same section. I use the platinum+ along with the GHD heat defence spray even though it states you don't need to use heat defence with these. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price for genuine ghds
customer_reviews.text: Got for a great price as part of black Friday, registered them on the ghd site straightaway, verifying them as genuine. These are to replace my old original ghd that still worked bit weren't feeling very smooth anymore and I've just done a quick test and the difference on how smoothly these glide through my hair is incredible. So very happy and hope I get as long out of these as I did my originals, which must be about a decade
customer_reviews.author: Erin Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was dubious about spending this amount of money but I needn’t of worried. I’ve always used decent, recommend brands but not GHD’s. My hair never looked as good as the hairdresser gets it....well it does now. They are amazing. My hair is soft and sleek using these....without I have frizzy wayward hair. Totally recommend these as a good investment
customer_reviews.author: rambie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing straighteners
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic straighteners and so much better than my old GHD''s. My hair glides through the plates with such ease. I find them brilliant for curling or waving my hair as well as straightening. I thought they may have been faulty to begin with, as the plates, when closed had a gap in them. I researched this and found that this was perfectly normal.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Really good, even though it’s my 2nd pair
customer_reviews.text: Why does it only get 4 stars? Because it’s my 2nd one. It probably lasted 2-3 years and a that price I’m sure it should lasted longer. Saying this, I still went and bought the same brand and model, because they really are good.
customer_reviews.author: Carla098

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my old Ghd wasn't as good as it used to be. Having had a Ghd before for many years , I wanted to get the new updated version of Ghd. This new Ghd is very stylish and heats up little faster than my old one .............and that's it. It does absolutely the same thing my old one done for my years.
customer_reviews.author: BeeMavis

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and straight
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing, I've been looking for hair straighteners that do a smooth job - and these are just perfect! They leave my hair smooth and soft, whilst straightening the hair just after a few strokes. They're amazing and well worth the money, I absolutely love them. They're light and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Having always only used GHD’s loved these when used in my salon. Sadly was disappointed with these...needed to go over hair several times...hair not as silky and shiny as with the older model...heat has been reduced to protect hair but end result is not good. Need to apply pressure to turn off.
customer_reviews.author: savvy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Not a good product. Made in China and overpriced. Very bad customer service from GHD in the U.K.
customer_reviews.author: Amasonica

customer_reviews.title: My hair is healthy again!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this hair straightener! I owned a nice BabyBel straightener that started to fry my hair and give me horrible split ends...my hair was in horrible condition before I bought this one. Within 1-2 weeks my hair was happy and healthy again, and I have received many compliments. I use the straightener to make waves with my hair and it works wonderfully! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep the invoice because they are bound to malfunction.
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully will last longer than 8 months like the previous set I got my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Hot in few seconds
customer_reviews.text: It's the best I ever tried. It's taking few seconds to rich the adequate temperature. This hair straightener is playing on Chanpions League, totally different to my previous one and the rest that I try before. The cable it's long and that is so useful.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Just amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing , I have short fine hair and use these to curl my hair , they glide effortlessly and create stunning curls , there lightweight too , I would definitely recommend these straighteners.
customer_reviews.author: hitch

customer_reviews.title: Hair
customer_reviews.text: My wife has an unhealthy obsession with hair. Using these things is the first thing she does in the morning. Her hair always looks ok to me but I’m a man so don’t really have a clue what bad hair vs good hair would look like.
customer_reviews.author: theenemywithin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these, hair feels lovely afterwards. Heats up very quickly and no burning of the hair? Highly recommend splashing out on these. Only negative point is there is no case for them which I would of expected for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST ITEM EVER!
customer_reviews.text: silky smooth straight hair or the nicest silky bouncy curls!! must have, great size, looks super stylish and works in US too which was must have for traveling!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: My first ever pair of GHD’s and despite using them before but never owning a pair, I couldn’t be anymore impressed! I highly recommend the product and there’s no surprise as to why GHD’s are such a popular brand.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: These straighteners are incredible
customer_reviews.text: I have bought other cheaper straighteners in the past, and had awful results. I decided it was time to try GHDs which I had heard so much about and they didn’t disappoint. They are incredible! My hair has always been difficult, but they make light work of it and leave it soft and shiny. I cannot recommend these highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best GHDs love them
customer_reviews.text: i got the right ones i tried my mums cloud nines she got for Christmas. they were okay my GHDS were quicker & my hair is more straight / shinier and feels soft & sleekly. i chose the ones for me
customer_reviews.author: Lucyanna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Straightener 👌🏽🤑
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it 😍 The colour is beautiful. It’s a genuine ghd too as I was a tad bit sceptical 🤨 but it works fantastically. Would definitely order more as gifts 🎁
customer_reviews.author: Mandi Mango

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: In her own words: It's the best hair straightener she ever owned and is worth the extra cost above cheaper versions. 6 months and going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew's Review Corner

customer_reviews.title: Genuine GHD product, great straighteners and arrived in perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: Genuine GHD product, registered on the GHD website. Arrived in perfect condition and beautiful straighteners. Great product and highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Grant Ward

customer_reviews.title: Meh!
customer_reviews.text: The plastic edge isn’t sealed and my hair gets caught in it and snaps. These were to replace my large ghds I’ve had for years but think my old one’s are better and hotter
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Plates are not level
customer_reviews.text: The over all product is good but the plates aren’t level so you have to apply more pressure to get them to fully touch causing the to pull on your hair
customer_reviews.author: Michael white

customer_reviews.title: BEST  Straightener ever
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product is great. It doesn't hurt my hair and leaves it shinny. I love it. Expensive but it is a good investment
customer_reviews.author: Triz

customer_reviews.title: Superb!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant straightener! Used to blow dry my hair straight but it took ages and could never get it as good as this gadget. Really good quality, very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: CKCork

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and far exceeds my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and I didnt hesitate to purchase this as GHD quality is always excellent product
customer_reviews.author: AXE

customer_reviews.title: Great straighteners
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these straighteners!! Fast heat up and glides through my hair. Comes with a protective sleeve for the plates so you don’t have to worry about burning your furniture
customer_reviews.author: sazzles16

customer_reviews.title: All good
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my partner, & she loves them, she said that she now figured out that her old straighteners were so bad after using these.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Rackley

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: excellent product they look really stylish very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.author: l.h

customer_reviews.title: Great finish for my hair
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic straighteners a much improved finish on the previous GHDs. Hot quick, easy to handle and the finish is superb. So glad I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Vincent

customer_reviews.title: overpriced and bag not included
customer_reviews.text: great quallity! Wouldhave been nice to have a carry bag included considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrei

customer_reviews.title: My lovely Hair Straighteners
customer_reviews.text: I'm really pleased with this product. I bought these hair straighteners when we were in the last lockdown, having booked my hair appointments when we came out, Sadly my hairdresser has closed down, so I'm so thankful I made this purchase. My hair is looking good, I'm finding the straighters very easy to use. They give a bleep when they are ready to use, ( a few seconds) and a light comes on. After use it is so easy to switch them off when another bleep happens.
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline barker

customer_reviews.title: Wow Wow Wow
customer_reviews.text: Wow Wow Wow. My new GHD Platinum Plus just arrived and I tried it straight away. It is amazing. I have only been using GHD‘s, since I had very bad experiences with cheaper hairstraighteners. The platinum plus is by far the best GHD on the market. The tongue closes properly compared to the old GHD‘s and grabs the hair nicely. The plates adjust their heat according to hair thickness, which keeps the hair healthy and shiny. My hair is very shiny and feels healthy after using it. I am sooo happy with my purchase. (My old GHD lasted for over 6 years they are very durable and worth the money)
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Great investment for difficult hair!
customer_reviews.text: These straighteners are fantastic! I have had an original pair of ghds for years & was quite happy with them. However, when I began to notice they weren't working quite so well I decided to invest in these. They are expensive but I can see why, they really work! I have very thick, frizzy, generally hard to tame hair, which rarely stays straight for more than a couple of hours, but these make it look sleek & smooth very easily & it stays that way all day! Plus it doesn't feel dry or damaged like it did after using the old ghds. Can't recommend these enough, they really are worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My old GHD's were fantastic but were showing signs of wear and tear (they were over ten years old). This version is so much better, they are easier to use, less tangles on the electrical lead, and the pads are hotter and smoother which makes straightening my hair even easier and quicker. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Need to go over hair slowly
customer_reviews.text: I felt this could have been better but eventually realised that you need to slowly go over the hair, takes a bit longer than Im used to but it certainly straightens.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: First impressions is really good. You get what you pay for- quality. Early days. Will update if any problems but not expecting any
customer_reviews.author: Allan Booth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought for girlfriend. Says the platinum version are more bulkier and allot better than her standard ones. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREW H.

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves them
customer_reviews.text: Personally I don''t use them but bought them for my wife & she loves them with the same hair dryer - Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: LoveMusic

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Because of the shape of the straighteners the bounce back isn't great and have to physically pry the two heating pads to fit your hair. Doesn't get rid of frizz and having a 30 minute sleep effect isn't helpful when your hair is 30 inches long and very very thick.
customer_reviews.author: Sorcha foy

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Not very happy with it for the price. I have very thick hair and think my older ghds straightened my hair better. I’m really disappointed after spending all that money
customer_reviews.author: sharon smith

customer_reviews.title: Be Your Own Rapunzel
customer_reviews.text: Honestly can't find the words to describe how much I LOVE my ghd. My long hair is... Well, you can see yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Miss. K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great tongs just what was required easy to use great to take with you.
customer_reviews.author: D curwen

customer_reviews.title: Best GHD yet
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several different GHD straighteners and this one is by far the best. It is easy to hold and use and it grips the hair surprisingly well - even the thinnest strands. It also heats up extremely quickly. It is well worth the extra expense.
customer_reviews.author: Shnooks

customer_reviews.title: Recipient is delighted
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift but I can say the recipient is delighted.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Tibbs

customer_reviews.title: Ghd every time
customer_reviews.text: Wow ghd has gone one better with this hair straightener compared to the last ones I bought in 2015.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: The wife loves GHD and these are the best yet
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Get this like a gift for my wife and she was so happy, was told me is the best hair straighteners that she ever have
customer_reviews.author: denisa geampana

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Much better than my old ones that used to burn the end of my hair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best straightener
customer_reviews.text: GHDs are the best straighteners but this one tops them all. It's perfect for straight and curly hair, doesn't burn hair at all even though I use it every day. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Noemi Granati

customer_reviews.title: Stylish straightners
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and easy to use, straightens my hair perfectly
customer_reviews.author: dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great hair straightener
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Doesn’t get dirty very easy, doesn’t meter is white. It’s very quick and for 15min max straight tick and long hair.
customer_reviews.author: A.M D

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: The best flat iron I have ever used. Makes my hair shiny and soft
customer_reviews.author: Patrycja

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: Unbeatable. So easy to use. Get to temperature quickly and are kind to hair. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Never disappointed with GHD
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, you can create lovely curls or perfectly straight hair. Love GHD straighteners, they never disappoint
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Bought these straighteners just over a year ago and they have now broken.. keep beeping and flashing red, I don’t know how to contact you directly.. is there anything we can do?
customer_reviews.author: Holly F.

customer_reviews.title: Ghd styler
customer_reviews.text: Always bought ghd, they always do what it says on the tin
customer_reviews.author: Caz

customer_reviews.title: The truth
customer_reviews.text: These are the best thing I’ve brought in ages, so smooth don’t nag at your hair when straightening lovely smooth finish. Great for curling too
customer_reviews.author: michaela

customer_reviews.title: Ghd platinum
customer_reviews.text: Very light comparing to my other Ghd but nice looking , hair feels silky and less friction , happy with this product, leaving my hair straighten for longer

customer_reviews.title: Great styler
customer_reviews.text: the temperature is perfect gives nice curl straighten hair nicely

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: My wife is very happy with it. Definitely worth the price.

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: Wrapped for Christmas and looked good in the box. Reviews are very good on other sites.

customer_reviews.title: Best straighteners ever
customer_reviews.text: Love love love, I can do my hair in half the time that I did with my old straightners

customer_reviews.title: A great hair straightener
customer_reviews.text: Best straightener I have bought for my wife. She loves them

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love it , best of all I have ever had

customer_reviews.title: 3 year guarantee
customer_reviews.text: It’s GHD what else is there to say. Expensive but very good. Bought to replace my previous pair which stopped working after two and a half years. These have a 3 year guarantee which is great as I use my straighteners almost every day.

customer_reviews.title: A must have for any girl who loves her hair
customer_reviews.text: Love these absolutely the best ones I’ve ever had and very stylish

customer_reviews.text: The lady these were bought for was completely over the moon. She tried them as soon as they arrived, and couldn't fault them at all.

customer_reviews.text: Usually I struggle to straighten my hair as only bought cheap straighteners in the past. Well worth forking out the extra to get ghd.

customer_reviews.text: Really pleased, I have fine grey hair and this is just the ticket. Not worried about it being too hot and discolouration.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: They contour perfectly to your hand for easy manoeuvrability. They leave your hair sleek and straight with no frizz

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I upgraded from my 19 year old GHDs. These are much smoother and easier to use. Especially for curling. They heat up so quickly and I have noticed significantly less breakage with these. Worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, although I don't feel they get as hot as they should

customer_reviews.title: BEST HAIR STRAIGHTENER EVER.
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely amaizing. It leaves my hair smooth like silk! Best hair straightener ever. Worth every penny. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: GHD platinum
customer_reviews.text: First pair of GHD and I love them. Heat up really quick.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this more than the original! Heats up super quick and is nice and sleek

customer_reviews.text: Very quick delivery came a day early woo hoo!! GHD Straighteners were perfect I don't know why I waited for so long to get new ones.

customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had these for long and find the heat doesn’t remain consistent and they just turn off halfway through doing my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Really love this GHD. Makes my hair smooth, heats up quickly and produces good waves and curls too.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Only need two stroke over my very curly hair to straighten it. Very pleased with my purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Packages
customer_reviews.text: I love amazon i have questions about the product whether it’s genuine or fake but yea it’s genuine .I’m really happy

customer_reviews.title: Very good to use and worthwhile
customer_reviews.text: This item I bought delivered from UK to China. It was cheaper here than buying from China. But I have to add a plug adapter. I like it very much!Good to use!

customer_reviews.title: BEST STRAIGHTENER EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT!!! It doesn’t nag your hair like others and gives a very nice finish!

customer_reviews.title: Easy and high quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and curly and straight hair any style

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace my old pair. Just love them there's nothing to dislike.

customer_reviews.title: Points !!
customer_reviews.text: I won major husband points with this purchase. Her hair looks 10x more silky

customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic. I have thick hair and the only straighteners that glide through

product_meta.title: ghd Platinum+ Styler White Professional Smart Hair Straighteners
product_meta.description:
Style Name:White EditionThe ghd platinum+ is ghd's smart styler with the one of the enhancements in technology. So intelligent it predicts your hair needs and constantly adapts to ensure the optimum styling temperature at all times. Get ultimate results and hair that is 70% stronger.*

BOX CONTAINS
ghd Platinum+ White Styler
feature_bullets: ghd’s smart styler for ultimate results and stronger hair*
One stroke styling with Ultra-zone with predictive technology predicts your hair's needs and the way you style for ultimate result and 70% stronger hair*
Uncompromising style - distinct wishbone hinge for perfect styling control
Beautiful results - precision-milled plates with ultra gloss coating for 20% more shine
Quick and versatile - Sleek design and rounder barrel: for quick snag-free styling
Peace of mind - Sleep mode: Switches off if not used for 30 minutes
Professional length 2.7 m cable. UK three pin plug

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars424 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
